spell.name: Cancer
spell.combatDescription: * Place The Magician on Cancer. * Either: * Generate 15 Shields (Clever: 30) or * Generate 8 Shields and 8 Shields for all allies in your Zone (Clever: 16 each) * Discard the card played on Cancer at the end of the turn.
spell.skillDescription: * Use Cancer to spawn a small, hard, magical force-field around you while exploring Paradise Lua, once per Day * The bubble lasts for 30 minutes, and holds enough air for all 30 of those minutes. * If fall damage were a problem (on the Moon, where gravity is not so harsh a mistress), the bubble would protect you from that, too.
spell.flavor: The crab is a master of defense.
